Posts.Content:
and I am going through chemo and radiation now.  I also have cancer in my vagina.  I am done the chemo for now but the radiation is killing me.  My vagina is red and raw and bleeding.  I am in so much pain.  I am using Anusol and pain meds.  I am also using Jeans Creme which is helping.  I take 4 sitz baths a day 
 
 
Michele
Posts.Title: I do not have breast cancer but rectal cancer
